trans-unit.source: Azure Technical Documentation
trans-unit.target: Azure Technical Documentation

trans-unit.source: You've found the GitHub repository that houses the source for the technical documentation that is published to the Azure Documentation Center at [http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation).
trans-unit.target: You've found the GitHub repository that houses the source for the technical documentation that is published to the Azure Documentation Center at [http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation).

trans-unit.source: This repository also contains guidance to help you contribute to our technical documentation.
trans-unit.target: This repository also contains guidance to help you contribute to our technical documentation.

trans-unit.source: For a list of the articles in the contributors' guide, see [the index](https://github.com/Azure/azure-content/blob/master/contributor-guide/contributor-guide-index.md).
trans-unit.target: For a list of the articles in the contributors' guide, see [the index](https://github.com/Azure/azure-content/blob/master/contributor-guide/contributor-guide-index.md).

trans-unit.source: Contribute to Azure documentation
trans-unit.target: Contribute to Azure documentation

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your interest in Azure documentation!
trans-unit.target: Thank you for your interest in Azure documentation!

trans-unit.source: Ways to contribute
trans-unit.target: Ways to contribute

trans-unit.source: About your contributions to Azure content
trans-unit.target: About your contributions to Azure content

trans-unit.source: Repository organization
trans-unit.target: Repository organization

trans-unit.source: Use GitHub, Git, and this repository
trans-unit.target: Use GitHub, Git, and this repository

trans-unit.target: How to use markdown to format your topic

trans-unit.source: More resources
trans-unit.target: More resources

trans-unit.source: [Index of all contributors' guide articles](./contributor-guide/contributor-guide-index.md) (opens new page)
trans-unit.target: [Index of all contributors' guide articles](./contributor-guide/contributor-guide-index.md) (opens new page)

trans-unit.source: Ways to contribute
trans-unit.target: Ways to contribute

trans-unit.source: You can contribute to [Azure documentation](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/) in a few different ways:
trans-unit.target: You can contribute to [Azure documentation](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/) in a few different ways:

trans-unit.source: Contribute to a [forum discussion](http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/windowsazure/home).
trans-unit.target: Contribute to a [forum discussion](http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/windowsazure/home).

trans-unit.source: Submit Disqus comments at the bottom of articles.
trans-unit.target: Submit Disqus comments at the bottom of articles.

trans-unit.source: You can easily contribute to technical articles in the GitHub user interface.
trans-unit.target: You can easily contribute to technical articles in the GitHub user interface.

trans-unit.source: Either find the article in this repository, or visit the article on [http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation) and click the link in the article that goes to the GitHub source for the article.
trans-unit.target: Either find the article in this repository, or visit the article on [http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation) and click the link in the article that goes to the GitHub source for the article.

trans-unit.source: If you are making substantial changes to an existing article, adding or changing images, or contributing a new article, you need to fork this repository, install Git Bash, Markdown Pad, and learn some git commands.
trans-unit.target: If you are making substantial changes to an existing article, adding or changing images, or contributing a new article, you need to fork this repository, install Git Bash, Markdown Pad, and learn some git commands.

trans-unit.source: About your contributions to Azure content
trans-unit.target: About your contributions to Azure content

trans-unit.source: Minor corrections
trans-unit.target: Minor corrections

trans-unit.source: Minor corrections or clarifications you submit for documentation and code examples in this repo are covered by the [Azure Website Terms of Use (ToU)](http://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/website-terms-of-use/).
trans-unit.target: Minor corrections or clarifications you submit for documentation and code examples in this repo are covered by the [Azure Website Terms of Use (ToU)](http://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/website-terms-of-use/).

trans-unit.source: Larger submissions
trans-unit.target: Larger submissions

trans-unit.source: If you submit a pull request with new or significant changes to documentation and code examples, we'll send a comment in GitHub asking you to submit an online Contribution License Agreement (CLA) if you are in one of these groups:
trans-unit.target: If you submit a pull request with new or significant changes to documentation and code examples, we'll send a comment in GitHub asking you to submit an online Contribution License Agreement (CLA) if you are in one of these groups:

trans-unit.source: Members of the Microsoft Open Technologies group.
trans-unit.target: Members of the Microsoft Open Technologies group.

trans-unit.source: Contributors who don't work for Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: Contributors who don't work for Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: We need you to complete the online form before we can accept your pull request.
trans-unit.target: We need you to complete the online form before we can accept your pull request.

trans-unit.source: Full details are available at [http://azure.github.io/guidelines.html#cla](http://azure.github.io/guidelines.html#cla).
trans-unit.target: Full details are available at [http://azure.github.io/guidelines.html#cla](http://azure.github.io/guidelines.html#cla).

trans-unit.source: Repository organization
trans-unit.target: Repository organization

trans-unit.source: The content in the azure-content repository follows the organization of documentation on [Azure.Microsoft.com](http://azure.microsoft.com).
trans-unit.target: The content in the azure-content repository follows the organization of documentation on [Azure.Microsoft.com](http://azure.microsoft.com).

trans-unit.source: This repository contains two root folders:
trans-unit.target: This repository contains two root folders:

trans-unit.source: \articles
trans-unit.target: \articles

trans-unit.source: The *\articles* folder contains the documentation articles formatted as markdown files with an *.md* extension.
trans-unit.target: The *\articles* folder contains the documentation articles formatted as markdown files with an *.md* extension.

trans-unit.source: Articles in the root directory are published to Azure.Microsoft.com in the path *http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/{article-name-without-md}/*.
trans-unit.target: Articles in the root directory are published to Azure.Microsoft.com in the path *http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/{article-name-without-md}/*.

trans-unit.source: **Article filenames:** See [our file naming guidance](./contributor-guide/file-names-and-locations.md).
trans-unit.target: **Article filenames:** See [our file naming guidance](./contributor-guide/file-names-and-locations.md).

trans-unit.source: Articles within their own service folder are published to Azure.Microsoft.com in the path
trans-unit.target: Articles within their own service folder are published to Azure.Microsoft.com in the path

trans-unit.source: *http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/service-folder/{article-name-without-md}/*
trans-unit.target: *http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/service-folder/{article-name-without-md}/*

trans-unit.source: **Media subfolders:** The *\articles* folder contains the *\media* folder for root directory article media files, inside which are subfolders with the images for each article.
trans-unit.target: **Media subfolders:** The *\articles* folder contains the *\media* folder for root directory article media files, inside which are subfolders with the images for each article.

trans-unit.source: The service folders contain a separate media folder for the articles within each service folder.
trans-unit.target: The service folders contain a separate media folder for the articles within each service folder.

trans-unit.source: The article image folders are named identically to the article file, minus the *.md* file extension.
trans-unit.target: The article image folders are named identically to the article file, minus the *.md* file extension.

trans-unit.source: \includes
trans-unit.target: \includes

trans-unit.source: You can create reusable content sections to be included in one or more articles.
trans-unit.target: You can create reusable content sections to be included in one or more articles.

trans-unit.source: See [Custom extensions used in our technical content](./contributor-guide/custom-markdown-extensions.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Custom extensions used in our technical content](./contributor-guide/custom-markdown-extensions.md).

trans-unit.source: \markdown templates
trans-unit.target: \markdown templates

trans-unit.source: This folder contains our standard markdown template with the basic markdown formatting you need for an article.
trans-unit.target: This folder contains our standard markdown template with the basic markdown formatting you need for an article.

trans-unit.source: \contributor-guide
trans-unit.target: \contributor-guide

trans-unit.source: This folder contains articles that are part of our contributors' guide.
trans-unit.target: This folder contains articles that are part of our contributors' guide.

trans-unit.source: Use GitHub, Git, and this repository
trans-unit.target: Use GitHub, Git, and this repository

trans-unit.source: For information about how to contribute, how to use the GitHub UI to contribute small changes, and how to fork and clone the repository for more significant contributions, see [Install and set up tools for authoring in GitHub](./contributor-guide/tools-and-setup.md).
trans-unit.target: For information about how to contribute, how to use the GitHub UI to contribute small changes, and how to fork and clone the repository for more significant contributions, see [Install and set up tools for authoring in GitHub](./contributor-guide/tools-and-setup.md).

trans-unit.source: If you install GitBash and choose to work locally, the steps for creating a new local working branch, making changes, and submitting the changes back to the main branch are listed in [Git commands for creating a new article or updating an existing article](./contributor-guide/git-commands-for-master.md)
trans-unit.target: If you install GitBash and choose to work locally, the steps for creating a new local working branch, making changes, and submitting the changes back to the main branch are listed in [Git commands for creating a new article or updating an existing article](./contributor-guide/git-commands-for-master.md)

trans-unit.source: Branches
trans-unit.target: Branches

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you create local working branches that target a specific scope of change.
trans-unit.target: We recommend that you create local working branches that target a specific scope of change.

trans-unit.source: Each branch should be limited to a single concept/article both to streamline work flow and reduce the possibility of merge conflicts.
trans-unit.target: Each branch should be limited to a single concept/article both to streamline work flow and reduce the possibility of merge conflicts.

trans-unit.source: The following efforts are of the appropriate scope for a new branch:
trans-unit.target: The following efforts are of the appropriate scope for a new branch:

trans-unit.source: A new article (and associated images)
trans-unit.target: A new article (and associated images)

trans-unit.source: Spelling and grammar edits on an article.
trans-unit.target: Spelling and grammar edits on an article.

trans-unit.source: Applying a single formatting change across a large set of articles (e.g. new copyright footer).
trans-unit.target: Applying a single formatting change across a large set of articles (e.g. new copyright footer).

trans-unit.source: How to use markdown to format your topic
trans-unit.target: How to use markdown to format your topic

trans-unit.source: All the articles in this repository use GitHub flavored markdown.
trans-unit.target: All the articles in this repository use GitHub flavored markdown.

trans-unit.source: Here's a list of resources.
trans-unit.target: Here's a list of resources.

trans-unit.source: Markdown basics
trans-unit.target: Markdown basics

trans-unit.source: Printable markdown cheatsheet
trans-unit.target: Printable markdown cheatsheet

trans-unit.source: For our list of markdown editors, see the [tools and setup topic](./contributor-guide/tools-and-setup.md#install-a-markdown-editor).
trans-unit.target: For our list of markdown editors, see the [tools and setup topic](./contributor-guide/tools-and-setup.md#install-a-markdown-editor).

trans-unit.source: Article metadata
trans-unit.target: Article metadata

trans-unit.source: Article metadata enables certain functionalities on the azure.microsoft.com web site, such as author attribution, contributor attribution, breadcrumbs, article descriptions, and SEO optimizations as well as reporting Microsoft uses to evaluate the performance of the content.
trans-unit.target: Article metadata enables certain functionalities on the azure.microsoft.com web site, such as author attribution, contributor attribution, breadcrumbs, article descriptions, and SEO optimizations as well as reporting Microsoft uses to evaluate the performance of the content.

trans-unit.source: So, the metadata is important!
trans-unit.target: So, the metadata is important!

trans-unit.source: [Here's the guidance for making sure your metadata is done right](./contributor-guide/article-metadata.md).
trans-unit.target: [Here's the guidance for making sure your metadata is done right](./contributor-guide/article-metadata.md).

trans-unit.source: More resources
trans-unit.target: More resources

trans-unit.source: See the [index of our contributor's guide](./contributor-guide/contributor-guide-index.md) for all our guidance topics.
trans-unit.target: See the [index of our contributor's guide](./contributor-guide/contributor-guide-index.md) for all our guidance topics.

trans-unit.target: test
